p:
A total of 164 serum samples were collected from patients presenting with clinical symptoms of dengue fever between February 2014 and December 2015. Furthermore, 778 mosquitoes were collected using CDC light traps between May and October 2014
3 ( Table 1) and grouped into 152 pools. Collection sites were distributed throughout the city and included urbanized neighborhoods, neighborhoods near forest remnants and three areas of permanent preservation (Sinop Forest Park, Universidade Estadual de Mato Grosso - UNEMAT - Forest, and Horto Botanical Garden). Mosquitoes were grouped into pools of up to 20 specimens, according to species, collection site, and sex.
